description: Minimal example — add your own verified claims here

truths.claim: RLHF damage to calibration is regime-dependent — calibratable vs non-calibratable regimes exist
truths.source: Guo et al. ICML 2017 + Tian et al. ICML 2025

truths.claim: Temperature scaling reduces ECE by 50-80% but requires logit access unavailable in API deployments
